verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
May the path that I walk
Be the path of righteousness.
May the words of my mouth
Give You praise.
May my heart be Your home
And a place for holiness.
I will worship You in love.
I will lift You, lift You up.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Alle, Allelujah
To the Father, to the Lord.
Alle, Allelujah
To the Savior forevermore.
